title: Blended Practice-Based Physiology Concept Application Project for Transfer Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Physiology and Medical Terminology Comprehension, Project-Based Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Learners must analyze real clinical cases and apply integrated physiological concepts across multiple organ systems. Collaboration and resource sharing are facilitated using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can explain three advanced physiological concepts by applying them to two or more clinical case studies
Learners can transfer learned concepts to new organ system clinical cases with over 75% accuracy
Learners can integrate associations between acquired concepts into three or more real-world project scenarios through mixed practice modes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
